title: Swap Learn hero illustration with uploaded logo asset

requirements.summary: Replace the Learn page hero source with the newly uploaded logo-based hero graphic while preserving existing responsive/styling classes.
acceptanceCriteria: The Learn page hero image no longer uses /assets/generated/hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png.
The selected hero uses a new static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated and renders without layout breakage (keeps responsive sizing and rounded/shadow styling).

file_operations.description: Add the generated landscape-cropped/letterboxed logo graphic asset (hero-guidance-logo.dim_1600x900.png) as a static file for the Learn hero image.

Update ONLY the selected hero (per provided XPath) to use src pointing to the new static asset at /assets/generated/hero-guidance-logo.dim_1600x900.png, keeping existing sizing and rounded/shadow className intact.

requirements.summary: Update the Learn hero image alt text to clear English describing the logo graphic without personal names.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero image alt text is in English and does not contain personal names.
Lighthouse/axe checks for missing alt text pass for this image.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the selected hero alt text to a clear English description of the logo graphic (exclude any personal names) while leaving all other Learn hero content unchanged.
